info.title: Replicon
info.description: Replicon is a self-driving professional services automation solution that uses advanced technology to analyze real-time data, and then delivers recommendations to help keep projects, resources, and finances on track. The connector allows you to continuously sync projects, tasks, and resource assignments from Project Online to Replicon and time data from Replicon to Project Online.
